thread.title: Great hotel close to a lot of attractions
thread.title_full: Great hotel close to a lot of attractions - Review of Le Relais des Halles, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Caleb D
title: Great hotel close to a lot of attractions
text: We stayed 3 nights for our honeymoon and it was wonderful. Attentive and friendly staff and beautiful rooms. We were able to walk to most everywhere we wanted to so that was a plus. The price was great considering the quality of the rooms and service.
